column2: (progn (setq vm-rel-root (expand-file-name "load-relative-fixtures" (file-name-directory (getenv "NEOVM_FORMS_FILE")))) (setq vm-rel-cwd (expand-file-name "cwd" vm-rel-root)) (setq vm-rel-loadpath (expand-file-name "loadpath" vm-rel-root)) (setq default-directory vm-rel-cwd) (setq load-path (cons vm-rel-loadpath '(nil))) 'ok)
